text: David Zepeda (born September 19, 1973, Nogales, Sonora) is a Mexican actor, model, singer and lawyer, he is best known for his roles in telenovelas such as: Acorralada, Abismo de pasión and Por amar sin ley. == Filmography == === Films === Year Title Role Notes Ref. 2003 Jeepers Creepers 2 Team member 2004 Desnudos Julio 2008 Two of a Kind Alex Short film 2021 Venom: Let There Be Carnage Maximiliano Uncredited cameo; Archive footage from Acorralada === Television === Year Title Role Notes Ref. 1999 Marea Brava Marcos 2001 Como en el cine Paco 2002 American Family Unknown role Episode: "Circle of Fire" The Shield Orlando Episode: "Carnivores" Buffy the Vampire Slayer Carlos Episode: "Lessons" Boston Public Rob Episode: "Chapter Fifty" 2003 Grounded for Life Boy Episode: "I Just Paid to Say I Love You" 10-8: Officers on Duty Denny Chestnut Episode: "Mercy, Mercy Me" 2004 Monk Jose Alverez Episode: "Mr. Monk and the Paperboy" ER EEG Tech Episode: "Just a Touch" Eve Waiter Episode: "For Love and Money" 2004–05 La heredera Fabián 2004–06 Los Sánchez Omar 3 episodes 2006 Amores cruzados Diego Main role;
